name: A Knock on Your Door
description:
A Knock on Your Door is an ambitious RPG Maker horror game made by the writer of Gambler: Rolling the Dice! In this game, you take the role of a man who just wants to sleep. However, a knock on his door beckons him, and the way he answers the door will spell life or death for him.

Features:

3 endings!

RPG Maker MV elements!

A bald protagonist!

Estimated playtime: about five minutes

Made for the Shitty Horror Game Jam, check the games out!

https://itch.io/jam/shitty-horror-game-jam
